languages.text: "Ты следила за мной. Была в курсе каждого произнесенного слова. Каково это, подглядывать за кем-то, кем ты никогда не будешь?"
"You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
languages.original_text: "Ты следила за мной. Была в курсе каждого произнесенного слова. Каково это, подглядывать за кем-то, кем ты никогда не будешь?"

traits.locale_text: "You spied on me. You were aware of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
"You spied on me. You were aware of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
"You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
"You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
"You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"
"You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir nachspioniert. Ihr wart über jedes meiner Worte im Bilde. Wie fühlt es sich an, jemandem heimliche Blicke zuzuwerfen, der man selbst nie werden kann?"
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir nachspioniert. Ihr wart über jedes meiner Worte im Bilde. Wie fühlt es sich an, jemandem heimliche Blicke zuzuwerfen, der man selbst nie werden kann?"

languages.text: « Vous m'avez {mf|espionné|espionnée}. Vous étiez au courant de mes moindres faits et gestes. Qu'est-ce que ça fait d'observer en secret quelqu'un que l'on n'a aucune chance de devenir ? »
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez {mf|espionné|espionnée}. Vous étiez au courant de mes moindres faits et gestes. Qu'est-ce que ça fait d'observer en secret quelqu'un que l'on n'a aucune chance de devenir ? »

languages.text: “你一直在监视我，你知道我说出的每个字。一刻不停地窥探某个永远无法企及的人，这种感觉如何？”
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: “你一直在监视我，你知道我说出的每个字。一刻不停地窥探某个永远无法企及的人，这种感觉如何？”

languages.text: «Me espiaba. Escuchaba todas las palabras que yo decía. ¿Qué se siente mirando a hurtadillas a alguien con quien no puede ni soñar ser?».
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: «Me espiaba. Escuchaba todas las palabras que yo decía. ¿Qué se siente mirando a hurtadillas a alguien con quien no puede ni soñar ser?».

languages.text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}を監視していた。{mf|俺|私}の言葉の一つ一つを知っていたな。決してなれない相手をこっそり覗き見るのは、どんな気分だ？」
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}を監視していた。{mf|俺|私}の言葉の一つ一つを知っていたな。決してなれない相手をこっそり覗き見るのは、どんな気分だ？」

languages.text: "Beni gizlice gözetledin. Ağzımdan çıkan her heceden haberdardın. Yerine geçmeyi hayal dahi edemeyeceğin birini sürekli gözetliyor olmak nasıl bir duygu?"
languages.original_text: "You spied on me. You knew of every word I said. How does it feel to sneak glances at one whom you could never hope to become?"

traits.locale_text: "Beni gizlice gözetledin. Ağzımdan çıkan her heceden haberdardın. Yerine geçmeyi hayal dahi edemeyeceğin birini sürekli gözetliyor olmak nasıl bir duygu?"
